definition: to register (at a hospital etc)/to send by registered mail

to hang or suspend (from a hook etc)/to hang up (the phone)/(of a line) to be dead/to be worried or concerned/to make a phone call (dialect)/to register or record/classifier for sets or clusters of objects/(slang) to kill/to die/to be finished/to fail (an exam)
ordinal number/day of a month/mark/sign/business establishment/size/ship suffix/horn (wind instrument)/bugle call/assumed name/to take a pulse/classifier used to indicate number of people

sentences.english: My mother has sent me a registered letter, I guess she has.
sentences.chinese: 我妈给我发了一封挂号信，我想她有的事情要说。

sentences.english: They say part of their income comes from the registration fee.
sentences.chinese: 他们称他们部分收入来源于挂号费。

sentences.english: Go ahead to the registration office first, then to the doctors.
sentences.chinese: 先到挂号处，再到医生那儿。

sentences.english: For registered mail, compensation shall be made according to standard amounts formulated by the competent department of postal services under the State Council.
sentences.chinese: 挂号信件，按照国务院邮政主管部门规定的金额赔偿。

sentences.english: Please pay five Yuan for your registration fee.
My mother has sent me a registered letter.
sentences.chinese: 我妈给我发了一封挂号信。

sentences.english: A: Do you want to register the parcel?
OK. How much do I need to pay for the registration?
sentences.chinese: 好的，我需要付多少钱挂号费？

sentences.english: I sent payment by registered airmail 5 days ago.
sentences.chinese: 我5天前用航空挂号把款寄去了。

sentences.english: Yes, it is. Which department for?
I'd like to send a letter by registered mall.
You should pay five Yuan for the registration fee.
How long will it take to Beijing by registered express airmail. ?
sentences.chinese: 用航空挂号快信寄往北京要几天才能到达？

sentences.english: All right, I'll have it registered, then.
Please send your application by registered mail.
sentences.chinese: 请把你的申请寄挂号信。

definition: to visit a doctor/to see a patient
to see a doctor/to seek medical advice
(TCM) interrogation, one of the four methods of diagnosis 四診|四诊[si4 zhen3]
waiting to see a doctor/awaiting treatment
to transfer (a patient for treatment in a different hospital)
